Package utils

Class MemberValidator

java.lang.Object
utils.MemberValidator
public class MemberValidator extends Object
This class is mainly responsible for validating member info from client input, also displays error messages when there is an invalid input.
Author:
Michael Liu, Genfu Liu

  • Constructor Details

    • MemberValidator

      public MemberValidator()

  • Method Details

    • validateMember

      public static boolean validateMember(String fname, String lname, String dob, String expire, String location)
      Validates all the member info that the user inputs
      Parameters:
      fname - Member first name
      lname - Member last name
      dob - Member dob in String form
      expire - Membership expiration date in String form (optional param)
      location - Member location in String form (optional param)
      Returns:
      true if all the member info are valid, false and also prints out an error message if invalid

    • validateAndCreateMember

      public static Member validateAndCreateMember(String fname, String lname, String dob, String expire, String location)
      Validates member info using validateMember() but additionally creates a Member if all info are valid
      Returns:
      a created Member object if all the info are valid, null if invalid

    • validateMemberDatabaseInsertion

      public static boolean validateMemberDatabaseInsertion(MemberDatabase memberDatabase, Member member)
      Used specifically when adding members to the MemberDatabase to check if it's a valid operation
      Parameters:
      memberDatabase - The MemberDatabase we're attempting to insert to
      member - The member we're trying to insert
      Returns:
      if the member can be inserted or not

    • validateMemberCheckIn

      public static boolean validateMemberCheckIn(ClassDatabase classSchedule, MemberDatabase memberDatabase, String classType, String fname, String lname, String dob)
      Used specifically when checking in a member to check if it's a valid operation
      Parameters:
      classSchedule - The ClassDatabase we're attempting to check in to
      memberDatabase - The MemberDatabase containing all the registered members
      classType - The class the member is trying to check in
      Returns:
      if the member can be checked in or not

    • validateMemberDrop

      public static boolean validateMemberDrop(ClassDatabase classSchedule, MemberDatabase memberDatabase, String classType, String fname, String lname, String dob)
      Used specifically when dropping a member from the ClassDatabase to check if it's a valid operation
      Parameters:
      classSchedule - The ClassDatabase we're attempting to drop from
      memberDatabase - The MemberDatabase containing all the registered members
      classType - The class the member is trying to drop
      Returns:
      if the member can be dropped
